passives.name: Call Lightning
passives.effects: Automatically river summon a storm cloud above you, which strikes a lightning bolt at your current location after 1.5 seconds to deal 135 â€“ 230 (based on level) magic damage (+30% bonus AD) (+50% AP) (+10% of target's maximum health) magic damage to enemies within the area and slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. If you are within the lightning strike, gain a shield equal to 14% of your maximum health (+75% AP) for 2 seconds.

passives.name: Fully Automated
passives.effects: Automatic river effects have their cooldown reduced by 1 second and now benefit from your ability haste. Call Lightning's cooldown cannot be reduced below 5 seconds by this effect.
